text: Jotindra Nath Roy was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Goalpokhar Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 1991, 1996 and 2001. He died on 23 April 2019 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1930s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 1991–1996 Category:West Bengal MLAs 1996–2001 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2001–2006
title: Jotindra Nath Roy
